#summary How to add marking string to Google calendar to make Event associated with Customer (Project, Task)
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =
This article shows how to add a marking string to associate Event in Google calendar with coresponding Customer, Project and Task.

= Details =

In order to associate a Event to some Customer, Project and Task it needs to be marked by string in given format. This string must be stored in Events description.

Format of this string can be configured in application configuration, but by default it has this format:

*{customer:CustomerName}{project:ProjectName}{task:TaskName}*
